  • Classes in eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily used by eu.amidst.core.conceptdrift.utils 
    Class and Description
    EF_LearningBayesianNetwork
    This class the abstract class EF_Distribution and defines a "Bayesian extended" model for a given Bayesian network.
    EF_UnivariateDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class EF_ConditionalDistribution and defines the univariate distribution in exponential family form.
  • Classes in eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily used by eu.amidst.core.distribution 
    Class and Description
    EF_BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents
    This class defines conditional distributions with a set of multinomial parents.
    EF_ConditionalDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class EF_Distribution and defines the Conditional Distribution in Exponential Family (EF) form.
    EF_Distribution
    This class defines an Exponential Family (EF) distribution in canonical form.
    EF_Multinomial
    This class extends the abstract class EF_UnivariateDistribution and defines a Multinomial distribution in exponential family canonical form.
    EF_Normal
    This class extends the abstract class EF_UnivariateDistribution and defines a Normal distribution in exponential family canonical form.
    EF_Normal_NormalParents
    This class extends the abstract class EF_ConditionalDistribution and defines a Conditional Linear Gaussian (CLG) distribution in exponential family canonical form.
    EF_UnivariateDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class EF_ConditionalDistribution and defines the univariate distribution in exponential family form.
  • Classes in eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily used by eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily 
    Class and Description
    EF_BayesianNetwork
    This class extends the abstract class EF_Distribution and defines a BayesianNetwork as a conjugate exponential family (EF) model, consisting of EF distributions in canonical form.
    EF_ConditionalDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class EF_Distribution and defines the Conditional Distribution in Exponential Family (EF) form.
    EF_Distribution
    This class defines an Exponential Family (EF) distribution in canonical form.
    EF_Normal_NormalParents.CompoundVector 
    EF_Normal.ArrayVectorParameter
    This class implements the interfaces MomentParameters, NaturalParameters, and SufficientStatistics.
    EF_NormalParameter.ArrayVectorParameter
    This class implements the interfaces MomentParameters, NaturalParameters, and SufficientStatistics.
    EF_UnivariateDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class EF_ConditionalDistribution and defines the univariate distribution in exponential family form.
    MomentParameters
    This interface extends the interface Vector and handles classes for representing the moment parameter vector of an exponential family distribution in canonical form.
    NaturalParameters
    This interface extends the interface Vector and handles classes for representing the natural parameter vector of an exponential family distribution in canonical form.
    ParameterVariables
    This class is used to store and handle the creation of the parameter variables of an extended Bayesian network model EF_LearningBayesianNetwork.
    SufficientStatistics
    This interface extends the interface Vector and handles classes for representing the sufficient statistics vector of an exponential family distribution in canonical form.
